Test Name: Streptococcus Group A, Molecular Detection (PCR), Throat
Purpose: To detect Streptococcus Group A in throat swab specimens using polymerase chain reaction.
Container: Sterile synthetic swab (nylon or rayon) on a plastic shaft transported in Amies or Stuart transport medium
Equipment: PCR thermal cycler, Class II biosafety cabinet, vortex mixer, microcentrifuge, pipettes with sterile filter tips, refrigerators and freezers
